statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 6 , 3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 1 , 8 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 13 , 2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 2 , x^{3} + x^{2} - 4 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
